caption: This is a chest X-ray. The image is a PA (posterior-anterior) view. The image quality is good. The modality is X-ray. The heart appears enlarged. There are multiple leads and pacing devices visible. The lungs appear clear.

The lesion appears to be causing some distortion of the surrounding brain tissue. The ventricles are visible, with the lateral ventricles appearing relatively normal in size. The overall image quality is good, with adequate contrast and resolution.
